item.title: things with buzzers: a sports competition
item.description: tl;dr: For the things with-buzzers series we created a frontend to run a sports competition at a local functional fitness gym. It stops the athlete’s time and ranks them according to the fastest. It was an exceptional feeling to hit the buzzer at the end of the workout. Check it out at things with buzzers: sports competition.
